name: Bloom Barrage
summary: Join Skip, the energetic mouse lemur, as he progresses to become the Bloom Barrage festival champion. Compete in various fun objectives to learn planting, skill-shots, and power-ups with Serena, the helpful panda. Overcome challenges posed by Thoreau, the grumpy iguana and Connie, the sly lynx. Level up and unlock seed equipment to increase seed projectile speed, plant growth rate, and player movement speed.
